title: Understanding Anger
text: Anger is a natural emotion that everyone experiences. It can be triggered by various situations or interactions.

title: Characteristics of Anger
text: Anger is often characterized by feelings of antagonism or hostility towards someone or something.

hintAnswer: subjective, emotional state characterized by antagonism toward someone or something perceived as causing harm or offense
title: Defining Anger
text: What is the definition of anger?
choices: subjective, emotional state characterized by antagonism toward someone or something perceived as causing harm or offense
aggression pertains to behaviors intended to harm or assert dominance over others
intentional use of physical force that results in injury, pain, or impairment
inability to manage or appropriately express emotions
